english_translation: Take gifts (al-'ata') as long as they are truly gifts. But when Quraysh contend with each other over kingship (mulk) and gifts become bribes (rishwah) for your religion, then do not accept them.

IISGrade: Disconnections But All Narrators Are Ok

english_translation: The Messenger of Allah ﷺ set out on the day of Hudaybiyyah with a group numbering between thirteen and fifteen hundred of his Companions. He divided them into two groups: one group he commanded to proceed ahead, and one group he kept with himself. Then an armed squadron from the polytheists intercepted him...

english_translation: I came to the Prophet ﷺ with my young son, and I had applied kohl (antimony) to his eyes. The Prophet ﷺ said: 'Remove this from him, for this is for women.'
